summary: This mod adds to Skyrim a new companion or follower with the name Sphere of Magic!!!
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds to Skyrim a new companion or follower with the name Sphere of Magic!!!

[youtube]uL39HcM2RDE[/youtube]

A new follower has a race of magical anomalies and is always ready to help the hero in a difficult battle or a journey through the world of Skyrim!

This companion develops along with the player derives its energy from neophocoena shower avangarda!

New companion to be around traconego priest Krosis!Like all companions has its own features

[color=#00ff00]____________________________________________
Collect funds for the establishment of online games.
 Any help in joy, I will be grateful!

 Web-money: R511088438832
____________________________________________[/color]

Nice game=)
author: bronihren
